ISSUE.TITLE: absolute URLs
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Drone appears to be hardwired to use absolute URLs pretty much everywhere - frontend and backend. This prevents drone from being used behind a reverse proxy that performs a path rewrite e.g. rewrite `http://frontend/drone` to `http://backend/`

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: [MISC] Separate Git Smart HTTP Protocol Into `Handler` and `Controller` (#717)
